title: Never Enough
lyrics:
You're all bark
But no bite
It's alright
You'll live a little
It's okay
You're on fire

You have style

It's just a little wild



What a poor little baby

Ah, such a poor little baby



No, it's never enough

You hide it away

Where no one can touch



Now you tell me

That you can do better

But we both know you can't

'Cause you'll never

Put away your anarchy

'Cause now we both know

That you're no good for me



In the dark

Without light

It's alright

You'll live a little

It's okay

You conspire

With desire

It's just a little wild



What a poor little baby

Ah, such a poor little baby



No, it's never enough

You hide it away

Where no one can touch



Now you tell me

That you can do better

But we both know you can't

'Cause you'll never

Put away your anarchy

'Cause now we both know

That you're no good for me



No, this is never enough

You hide it away

Where no one can touch

It's never enough

It's just never enough

You hide it away

Where no one can touch



Now you tell me

That you can do better

But we both know you can't

'Cause you'll never

Put away your anarchy

'Cause now we both know

That you're no good for me

No good for me
